sentences.sContent: We are confident next year’s profits will be higher.
sentences.sCn: 我们确信明年的利润会增加。

sentences.sContent: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.sCn: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

sentences.sContent: ...Team building skills are in short supply: Deloitte reports that only 12% of the executives they contacted feel they understand the way people work together in networks and only 21% feel confident in their ability to build cross-functional teams...

trans.tranOther: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect
